#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int T;
	string A;
	string B;
	cin >> T;
	while (T--)
	{
		
		A.clear();
		B.clear();
		int x = 0, y = 0, x1 = 0, y1 = 0;
		cin >> A >> B;
		int n = A.length();
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
		{
			if (A[i] != B[i])
			{
				if (A[i] == '0')
				{
					x++;
				}
				else
				{
					y++;
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (A[i] == '0')
				{
					x1++;
				}
				else
				{
					y1++;
				}
			}
		}
		if ((x == 0 && x1 == 0) || (y == 0 && y1 == 0))
		{
			cout << "Unlucky Chef" << endl;
		}
		else
		{
			if (x > y)
			{
				cout << "Lucky Chef" << endl << x << endl;
			}
			else
			{
				cout << "Lucky Chef" << endl << y << endl;
			}
		}
		A.clear();
		B.clear();
	}
}
